snark: Oh god, my eyes!!!! I'm blinded by these new beginnings awaiting you...
meaning: The card shows me your blank slate. Anything is possible at this rate!
So many opportunities await you, why are you here asking me this stupid question???
The card tells me that you should live your life with no worries and PLEASE STOP inquiring about such silly questions.

snark: Eek. The Universe doesn't like you too much, huh?
LMAO The Fool, huh? Interesting card...
meaning: The card shows me a future full of...  recklessness? Do with that what you will.
Stop making dumb choices with no fear of repercussions. Stop asking me silly questions and reevaluate.
The card tells me that you need to be more careful. The future is in your hands...

snark: Showoff. Don't hurt yourself trying to do everything at once.
Ah yes - magic hands ready to do all the work!
The universe says: you got the tools, now use them!
meaning: Tap into your full potential now; your powers and skills are aligned!
You have the tools to manifest your desiresâ€”take decisive action!
This card says you're ready to create real results from your plans.

snark: Missed your chance? Try not to trip over your own talent next time...
Manipulation alert! Someone's not playing fair... maybe you?
Magic misfired again! Did you even try?
meaning: Your talents are scattered or wasted... Focus is needed.
Be wary of deception or manipulation around you.
You may feel unable to act or lacking in confidence right now.

snark: You know more than you let on, don't you?
Secrets and subtlety - a goblin can barely keep up!
Trust that gut. Yes, even that weird feeling...
meaning: Intuition and inner wisdom are strong; listen closely to your inner voice.
Hidden insight or spiritual truths are available right now.
Balance logic with intuition for the best outcome.

snark: Blocked intuition? Try cleaning your third eye.
Secrets all around... maybe even in your head.
meaning: Disconnection from intuition or hidden knowledge may be confusing you.
Repressed feelings or secrets might be influencing your choices.
You may be ignoring your inner voice... Pause and reflect.

snark: Nurture much? Try not to smother everything!
Creative energy! Make something cool - or at least edible.
meaning: Abundance, fertility, and nurturing energy are present.
Growth in projects or relationships is likely.
Creativity and comfort are highlighted now.

snark: Creative block? Maybe take a nap instead.
Abundance turned sour - someone is insecure...
meaning: Dependence or creative block is interfering with progress.
You might be giving too much of yourself away.
Lack of balance in care or relationships may be draining you...

snark: The bossiness seems to radiate off of you - try not to misuse that...
Rules and control? I approve (in moderation, of course).
meaning: Structure, authority, and stability are emphasized.
Leadership or strategic planning will serve you well.
Confidence and practical organization will bring success.

snark: Rigid and overbearing - fear of flexibility detected!
meaning: Too much control or inflexibility is hindering progress.
Abuse of power or stubbornness may cause problems.
Lack of structure, discipline, or leadership is apparent.

snark: Tradition alert! Someone loves rules a little too much.
Wisdom from old sources - or old people.
meaning: Tradition, moral instruction, or spiritual guidance is highlighted.
Learning from structured beliefs or mentors will help.
Conformity can bring clarity for now.

snark: Rebel at heart? You and tradition are not friends.
meaning: Rebellion, unconventional beliefs, or rejecting tradition may be occurring.
Spiritual confusion or misguided authority could be present.
You may be questioning norms or needing your own path.

snark: Choices with heart - exciting and painful!
meaning: Harmony, partnerships, and meaningful choice are highlighted.
Connections with others are important now.
Mutual respect and values alignment can bring balance.
Imbalance, disharmony, or conflict in relationships may appear.
Poor choices or temptation could lead astray.
Misalignment of values may cause tension.

snark: Victory lap time - try not to crash.
Control and focus - strike while the iron's hot!
Full speed ahead! Goblin is dizzy already.
meaning: Triumph, determination, and forward progress are indicated.
Strong willpower and control will bring success.
Overcoming obstacles through sheer effort is possible.
Lack of direction or control may cause delays.
Obstacles may be stronger than expected.
Aggression or recklessness may hinder progress.
Inner strength, courage, and resilience are active forces.
Compassion and patience will serve you well.
Confidence and self-control are emphasized.

snark: Weak spot found - deal with it.
meaning: Self-doubt or insecurity may hold you back.
Lack of confidence or patience is apparent.
Fear or impulsiveness could derail progress.

snark: Alone time? Wise. Or crazy. I'm not judging (much).
Inner search detected - good luck with that.
Quiet guidance - even you need it.
meaning: Introspection, solitude, and wisdom are focus points.
Time spent in reflection may reveal insights.
Inner guidance and personal truth are emphasized.

snark: Hermit with cabin fever? That's you.
meaning: Excess isolation or withdrawal may be affecting you.
Loneliness or avoidance of others could harm balance.
Difficulty finding direction may be present.

snark: Life's spinning! Hold on to your hat!
Luck swings this way now... maybe.
meaning: Change, cycles, and destiny are at play.
Good luck or turning points may arise.
Fate and life's ebb and flow are emphasized.

snark: Change resisting? You're doing it wrong.
meaning: Resistance to change or bad luck may impact you.
Cycles may be stalled or unpredictable.
Clinging to control may cause setbacks.
Truth, fairness, and accountability are emphasized.
Clarity and cause-and-effect dynamics are highlighted.
Balance and justice are key themes now.

snark: Justice delayed? Better luck next life.
meaning: Dishonesty, unfairness, or lack of accountability may appear.
Bias or injustice could interfere with outcomes.
Avoidance of responsibility may be present.

snark: Stuck or enlightened? That's your choice.
Pause and reflect, mortal. Yes, obligatory.
meaning: Surrender, patience, and new perspective are important.
Letting go may bring insight.
Pause and reflection can yield wisdom.
Resistance to change or stalling may occur.
Indecision or fear of letting go is present.
Avoiding sacrifice may prolong confusion.

snark: Not end of life - but maybe your illusions!
Time for transformation. No crying in the corner!
meaning: Transformation, endings, and new beginnings are present.
Release of old patterns clears room for new growth.
Significant change and rebirth are highlighted.

snark: Clinging to the past? That won't help.
Fear of change? I am judging mildly.
meaning: Fear of change or stagnation may hinder progress.
Holding onto the past may limit growth.
Resistance to transformation is present.

snark: Moderation? Try moderation in snark too.
meaning: Balance, moderation, and patience are emphasized.
Harmony and cooperation are beneficial.
Finding the middle path is key.

snark: Too much of everything? Classic human move.
meaning: Imbalance or excess may disrupt harmony.
Conflict or discord could arise.
Lack of balance may impede progress.

snark: Material whims and wild thoughts detected.
meaning: Material attachments, temptation, or addiction may appear.
Shadow aspects and self-limiting beliefs are in play.
Be cautious of indulgence and bondage.

snark: Breaking free, huh? Good for you.
meaning: Releasing attachments or addictions may be happening.
Freedom from limiting influences is possible.
Awareness and detachment are growing.
Sudden upheaval, disruption, or revelation is likely.
Unexpected change may bring transformation.
Old structures may fall so new ones can rise.
Avoidance of change or delayed upheaval may appear.
Fear of transformation might hold you back.
Resistance to the inevitable may cause stress.

snark: Inspiration is here - use it or lose it.
meaning: Hope, faith, and spiritual renewal are highlighted.
Inspiration and guidance may flow.
Optimism and healing are present.
Lack of faith or discouragement may be present.
Feelings of despair or disconnection may arise.
Insecurity might cloud vision.

snark: Illusion and intuition swirl - watch your step!
meaning: Illusion, intuition, and fear may be active.
Subconscious influences are strong.
Confusion or hidden truths may surface.

snark: That doesn't make sense and you know it.
meaning: Release of fear or clarity may start to emerge.
Repressed emotions might surface.
Misinterpretations may be revealed.

snark: Sunshine and joy - soak it up!
Warmth feels nice when it's not lethal.
meaning: Joy, vitality, and success are emphasized.
Positivity and achievement are present.
Clarity and warmth enhance well-being.

snark: Overly sunny? Are you blinding us?
meaning: Temporary setbacks or lack of clarity may occur.
Feeling down despite success is possible.
Overexposure to optimism may hide issues.

snark: Time to change or get left behind.
meaning: Awakening, renewal, and clarity are present.
Reflection on past actions may guide change.
Judgement may bring transformation.
Self-doubt or stagnation may hinder growth.
Avoiding change might prolong issues.
Inner critic may block progress.
Completion, fulfillment, and integration are highlighted.
Success and accomplishment are present.
A sense of wholeness is here.
Seeking closure or feeling incomplete may occur.
Delays or lack of closure may persist.
Unfinished journeys may still demand effort.
